NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
ANNONA: Could this be the <color=orange>Sixth Location Locator</color> you mentioned, Bells?
2
1
BELLS: Yes, but.. I apologize for misleading you, Annona. I had assumed our locator was more sophisticated than it actually was...
3
2
BELLS: According to Filix, the <color=orange>Sixth Location Locator</color> appears unable to track the precise position of any planet.. It simply detects which celestial body the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> is orbiting.
4 3
BELLS: And despite its name, the <color=orange>Sixth Location Locator</color> can only detect the absence of the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon's</color> signal as it visits the sixth location.
5
4
ANNONA: I see..
6
5
ANNONA: Nevertheless, I am thrilled to see how differently our friends here on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> have approached designing a device for this purpose.
7
6
ANNONA: And though it does appear more rudimentary, I do see one major benefit in this locator over ours on <color=lightblue>Ember Twin.</color>
8
7
ANNONA: That is, the simplicity and clarity of...
9
8
ANNONA: Bells, what is that..? A glowing meteor approaches us.
10
9
BELLS: That is.. a meteor from the volcanic moon! And it is rapidly heading towards us!
11
10
BELLS: Quick, Annona! We should seek shelter inside the <color=orange>Tower of Quantum Knowledge</color> before we continue this discussion!
BH_QML EX1 6
BH_QML EX2 2
BH_QML EX3 6
BH_QML EX4 7
BH_QML R4 3
